events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is broken with visible scratches and it doesn’t work as expected.
The issue has been categorized as Product Defect based on the description of damage and malfunction.
A customer support agent has been assigned to your case to assist you further with the broken product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that your product arrived damaged. I’m here to help you resolve this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the broken parts to help us assess the problem accurately?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches and the faulty product parts as you requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can send you a replacement immediately or offer a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to receive a replacement, as I really like the product but want one without defects.
A replacement order has been placed and will be shipped to you within 3 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We hope the replacement product arrived in perfect condition. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your cooperation and feedback.
